snippet.title: Flappy Dragon Trailer
snippet.description:
🐉 Flappy Dragon will be available on iOS and Android on 19 November 2021!

Download here:
🤖 Android - Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.coreventura.flappydragon
🍎 iOS - App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/flappy-dragon/id1586540488

Description:
In Flappy Dragon you can hatch eggs and collect different dragons with unique skills and fly stats. Travel through beautiful worlds earning valuable crowns and exclusive dragon eggs! Collect them all!

The game difficulty is progressive so everybody can play and start practising to become a flappy pro. Will you be up to the challenge?

Contact me:
🐦Twitter: https://twitter.com/core_ventura
